transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hi ma'am, very good afternoon.
Customer: Good afternoon.
Executive: Ma'am, main Udita se baat kar rahi hu IndiaMART se.
Customer: Ji ma'am.
Executive: Ji ma'am actually abhi abhi aapne IndiaMART ke helpline mein call kiya tha. Ma'am lekin yahan par aapka number nahi hai Khateshyam Enterprises mein.
Customer: Wo isliye nahi hai ma'am kyunki register nahi kiya maine abhi mera number. Sir ke hi do number already registered hai.
Executive: Ji ji ji. Thik hai koi nahi. To ma'am isme aapko aapko Google Meet chahiye thi I think.
Customer: Haan ma'am Google Meet le lijiye aap.
Executive: Ek second aap call par rahiye main aapko link share kar rahi hu.
Customer: Haan ye registered mail pe aayegi na ma'am?
Executive: Ji ma'am registered mail par hi aayegi aapke. Aap kaise join karenge phone se ya fir kaise?
Customer: Phone se hi karenge ma'am.
Executive: Ek second. Haan.
Executive: Waise ma'am aapne kabhi use kiya hai isse pehle IndiaMART?
Customer: Haan ma'am IndiaMART open hai.
Executive: Thik hai ek second. Aapke phone mein to hoga na open?
Customer: Haan mere phone mein hai na.
Executive: Achcha achcha thik hai. Aur ma'am ye jo sir hai wo use nahi karte Kamal Kishore ji jo hai.
Customer: Haan sir kafi matlab bahut kam use karte hain. Ye log hum log handle kar lete hain.
Executive: Achcha to aap hi log handle karte ho?
Customer: Ji ma'am.
Executive: To ma'am yahan par na aap bol kar team se ya fir jaise bhi sir se baat karke aap apna number yahan pe add arrange kara dijiye. Kyunki hum log to agar feedback ke liye ya fir jis jis ke liye bhi kabhi bhi connect karenge to hum sir se hi karenge. Kyunki sir ka number yahan. Alternate number mera dal dungi ma'am main.
Executive: Haan ji.
Customer: Alternate number mera add kar dungi main isme to aap isse bhi contact kar payenge.
Executive: Ji bilkul aapna na number yahan pe add on kara dena. Dusri cheez ma'am yahan pe abhi aapko ek mahina hone wala hai service use karte hue.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Like nikal ke aaya hai.
Customer: Response aa raha ho.
Executive: Ji. Response to ma'am ha kam hai par hai.
Executive: Achcha kam hai par hai. To calls to aapke number pe aati hogi kyunki aapka number to yahan par registered nahi hai.
Customer: Haan ye problem hai. Aur dusra ye ki ma'am bahut sare schedule hi nahi mil pata hai ki IndiaMART direct apan kar le use. Iske liye humne ek ma'am bhi appoint kiye hain. Ab IndiaMART pura profile wahi dekhenge to koi issue aana hi nahi hai abse.
Executive: Achcha to aapne kisi ko hire kiya hai jo ki aapka pura IndiaMART dekhenge.
Customer: Haan IndiaMART se related jo bhi hoga wo ma'am dekh lenge ab.
Executive: Achcha achcha to fir aap unse ko bol sakte ho ki aapne aapka number yahan pe diya hai.
Customer: Haan unka number main yahan pe alternate mein karwa dungi ma'am.
Executive: Achcha achcha ek second aap please call par rahiyega. Haan.
Executive: Ek bar main yahan pe aapka catalog open kar leti hu. Ji.
Executive: Aapko kya kya cheez doubt hai ma'am abhi aap service mein aap mujhe bata sakte ho jis according main yahan pe aapko service guide karna start karu.
Customer: Ma'am main to usme lead manager by lead contact kar leti hu but ye jo ma'am nayi hire ki hai inhe aapko pura basic se batana padega.
Executive: Achcha achcha to matlab aapko ek bar pura ka pura ek bar overview chahiye thoda sa.
Customer: Haan thoda sa aap inko guide kar denge to fir acche se kar payenge.
Executive: Koi nahi koi nahi main aapko is cheez ke liye yahan pe guide kar deti hu. Yahan par jo aapki registered mail ID hai wo main aapko bhi bata deti hu aap ek bar mujhe correct kijiyega. Khatushyam Enterprises22@gmail.com exactly yahi ID hai usma'am?
Customer: Haan yahi ID hai.
Executive: Ye aap thik hai ye aapke phone mein login hai?
Customer: Haan mere phone mein hi login hai.
Executive: Ek second rukiye.
Executive: All over India deal karte ho ma'am aap?
Customer: Ji ma'am.
Executive: Achcha all over India deal karte ho aisa to nahi hai ki sirf Madhya Pradesh mein dekhte ho?
Customer: Nahi nahi aisa kuch nahi hai all over India.
Executive: Achcha achcha aur ye pehle bhi kabhi aapne monthly services bhi use ki.
Customer: Haan jaise sir ne kiya tha baki uses to kiye unhone paid wale bhi kiye hain.
Executive: Ji ma'am.
Customer: Paid wale bhi use kiye hain monthly service bhi use kiye sir ne.
Executive: Achcha achcha. Thik hai aap ek bar meri call speaker par kar lijiye ek bar check kijiye aapke pass Udita IndiaMART ke naam se koi mail receive hua hai kya?
Customer: Maine login nahi le rakha hai abhi tak ha invitation aaya hai.
Executive: Aaya hua hai na invitation. Thik hai no worries. Ek kam kijiye aap join kijiye ek bar.
Customer: Main wahan pe connect karungi.
Customer: Ji. Call disconnect karke join karu ma'am?
Executive: Haan call disconnect karke please join kijiye.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer's number not registered with IndiaMART.

- Wants Google Meet link on registered email.

- Needs guidance for newly hired employee on IndiaMART.



Resolution:

- Executive shared Google Meet link.

- Offered to guide the customer's new employee.

- Confirmed registered email ID.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will disconnect call and join meet.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- google meet, registration, guidance, email id
